EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different Academy: Book Your Flights!!!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName}!
This is just a reminder that flights right now are only $300-$500 return from Vancouver, Edmonton, Calgary, and Toronto as well as other cities to San Diego, CA. It is a really good time to start booking your flights. Please see flight details below for dates.
Tuition/Payment: Here is your payment breakdown: $5,995 - Tuition Total
$300 - Initial Deposit, upon registration (paid directly to Live Different) July 30, 2014 - $2,695 - Academy Tuition (paid directly to Live Different) September 30, 2014 - $3,000 - Academy Charitable project cots (donations that can receive a tax receipt through you Canada Helps fundraising page)
Flights:
Please book your flights to and from the San Diego Airport
Airport Code: SAN Arrival: September 14, 2014 Departure: December 13, 2014
Schedule:
September 14th - Fly to San Diego, CA (Airport Code: SAN) September 15th - Drive down to Vicente Guerrero, Baja California, Mexico. September 16th - Orientation September - December - Please view PDF for information on your semester (insert PDF tab here). December 10/11th - Graduation for our Academy program. December 12th - Drive up to San Diego, CA. December 13th - All students fly home from San Diego, CA.
Talk to you guys soon!
Sincerely,
Joy Yu
